Title: Her. Him. The Other
Director: Asoka Handagama, Vimukthi Jayasundara, Prasanna Vithanage
Writer: Asoka Handagama, Vimukthi Jayasundara, Prasanna Vithanage
Actors: Dharshana Vidya Aravinda, Mohamed Atheef, F. Jules Colin, Juliyan Gaarvith Galindawattha
Plot: Three Sri Lankan filmmakers renowned for their internationally acclaimed films based on the Sri Lankan civil war, join in to make one film to express their views on post-war reality.
